01 Dec 2017

Pan-Fried Shrimp Cake

Healthy seafood snack or appetizer!

Ingredients:

  • fresh prawn 300 grams
  • 2 grams of salt
  • sugar 3 grams
  • 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
  • cooking wine 5 grams
  • 1 egg

Cooking Steps

  1. First we need to prepare the raw prawn.

  2. Peel the prawn

  3. Finely mince the prawn with a knife until it forms a paste

  4. Add the prawn paste, salt, sugar, black pepper, and cooking wine to a bowl

  5. Stir until the mixture is completely mixed.

  6. Add one egg white (do not add the yolk)

  7. Continue stirring until the egg white is fully incorporated.

  8. Place the shrimp mixture into a plastic bag or a pipping bag.

  9. Preheat the electric baking pan

  10. Once the pan is pre-heated spread a layer of cooking oil over the pan.

  11. Cut a hole in the bag containing the shrimp paste and squeeze small amounts of it onto the electric pan, make sure to leave sufficient space in between so the shrimp cakes do not stick together.

  12. Close the electric pan and bake for about 3 minutes or until the surface is a golden colour. Serve hot.
